selkie.config — Configuration

The Selkie user configuration file is ~/.selkie. (One may change the filename by setting the environment variable SELKIE_CONFIG.) Here is a fragment of an example:

data :
   conll ~/cl/data/conll
   panlex :
      dirname |panlex-20190901-csv
      tgtdir ~/cl/data/panlex

To access it:

>>> from selkie.config import config
>>> config.data.conll
'~/cl/data/conll'

The configuration file is in Indented key-value format (KVI).
